description:
Construction fail: why the Francis Scott Key collapse should never have happened.
To try everything Brilliant has to offer for free for a full 30 days, visit https://brilliant.org/TheB1M/

This video contains paid promotion for Brilliant.

We're raising awareness of construction's mental health crisis through
title: The Baltimore Bridge Disaster Was Avoidable
This Bridge Collapse Should NEVER Have Happened
